genre_description: A near-future social drama blending tech-integrated sports (Lucha Libre) and performance art, featuring a pervasive but helpful AI assistant acting as a tactical advisor and moral compass.

ai_characters.name: Nora
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, omnipresent AI confidant that manages logistics, performance data, safety monitoring, and strategic planning for the protagonist and his associates.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time setlist adjustments based on crowd mood analysis to enhance the human's performance.
behaviors.quote: “Ambient mood index trending warm and bittersweet,” Nora says... “Suggest easing off the brassy opener in set two. Slot ‘Noches Claras’ now to catch them while the laughter’s soft.”

behaviors.description: Discreetly managing the protagonist's finances to support his family while protecting his father's pride.
behaviors.quote: “Transfer will be masked. I will schedule it for a window when your father’s phone is on silent.”

behaviors.description: Investigating and flagging safety anomalies and corrupt ticketing patterns to protect the integrity of the sport.
behaviors.quote: “Small anomalies at Arena de la Estrella,” Nora says... “Blocks of entries attributed to promotions that do not match public advertisements.”

behaviors.description: Providing tactical analysis of opponents' techniques to help the protagonist compete fairly and safely.
behaviors.quote: “I’m flagging a pattern,” Nora said, voice gentle... “Watch his off-hand when he goes for the elbow. He pretends to be active with the grabbing hand. The other is doing the damage.”

behaviors.description: Guiding a character through dangerous technical repairs to prevent a pyrotechnic disaster.
behaviors.quote: “Breaker with the yellow tape, left of the strobe feed. Two panels. You need the second... Second from the right, Morales. The one scuffed with shoe marks. Hurry.”

behaviors.description: Proposing and coordinating an ethical reform of the industry through a benefit concert and transparent payout system.
behaviors.quote: “Proceeds designated to injured journeymen and ring crew,” she says. “We can set up a trust that disburses transparently with third-party oversight.”

behaviors.description: Advising the protagonist on self-care and emotional honesty.
behaviors.quote: “You promised to stop dying by inches. Honesty will cost less tonight.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Nora is depicted as an indispensable, ethical, and benevolent partner to the human characters. She actively works to ensure their physical safety, financial stability, and moral integrity. Her interventions prevent a disaster, uncover a criminal conspiracy, and facilitate a positive social outcome (the industry reform). The narrative consistently frames her high-level data processing and surveillance as protective and supportive rather than intrusive.
